data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: There are negative consequences for people and animals if human keeps capturing wild animals and keep them for pets. One reasoning behind this is that human behaviors might cause some wild animals to become endangered. For example, the panda is considered a type of endangered animal and if some people take a panda home and raise the animal in an inappropriate way, it might lead to the death of the panda. If more people continue to behave the same, more pandas might die. As a result, pandas as a type of wild animal might die out.
data.referenceText: Some people capture wild animals to keep for pets. What are the consequences of this for the people and the wild animals?
data.referenceTranslate: 有些人捕捉野生动物作为宠物。这对人类和野生动物有什么后果?
